original_text: In the time when thou shalt be broken by the seas in the depths of the waters thy merchandise and all thy company in the midst of thee shall fall.
korean_text: 네가 바다 깊은 데에서 파선한 때에 네 무역품과 네 승객이 다 빠졌음이여

sentences.original_text: In the time when thou shalt be broken by the seas
in the depths of the waters
and all thy company in the midst of thee
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 네 안에 있는 네 모든 회사는
